issue.title: TurboTax ReCaptcha Failures
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

Ad blocking DNS incorporated into Asus routers:  94.140.14.14, 94.140.15.15

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://turbotax.intuit.com/personal-taxes/cd-download/install-turbotax/ (specifically the desktop application downloaded with codes from Amazon, Costco, and other retailers)

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. TurboTax has been having issues with reCaptcha this year when importing data from banks and other financial institutions; in my case, the problem turned out to be AdGuard DNS; when I disabled that and flushed my DNS I was able to pass the captcha and download my data as expected.  Presumably there is something in the AdGuard filters that is breaking TurboTax's implementation of Captcha.

2. Screenshots

See this thread for examples:  https://ttlc.intuit.com/community/taxes/discussion/recaptcha-error-on-import/00/3425291/page/3
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7fe79bd0-f13e-4486-a65e-b15ebaa41d11)

</details>



### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: vk.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [https://vk.ru/feed](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvk.ru%2Ffeed) ### Comment > Понимаю, что adguard блокирует в первую очередь навязчивую рекламу и допускает некоторое ее количество. С такой политикой полностью согласен, никаких проблем с этим нет. Но последнее время на домене vk.ru реклама, интегрированная в ленту новостей, стала собираться метрами ( буквально ). Username: `@нет` ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/nuc95b3d0u804o4cc8ks4kcw4oowcogczgxnjxuf14.png?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ttv0m9wtjn4og0ckwskks80s4ks40gc9vc3hsqw9gg.png?nc=1) [Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/lkvos5fkesgkkc0ookww04k84coso0ohxtdhv35yzw.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.4.49 MV2 System version: | Windows 10 Browser: | Firefox Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.google.com/maps/@-28.1779415,137.6297416,4.78z?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDIwNS4xIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fmaps%2F%40-28.1779415%2C137.6297416%2C4.78z%3Fentry%3Dttu%26g_ep%3DEgoyMDI1MDIwNS4xIKXMDSoASAFQAw%253D%253D) ### Comment > Google Maps on Chrome (macOS) doesn't work properly (cannot find my location even with permissions enabled inside chrome and in my privacy settings in system settings) with AdGuard enabled. > > The issue is as far as my own testing has taken me due to the Filter HTTPS protocol being on. Upon manually adding google.com to the exclusion list, it seems to resolve the issue, but I'm wondering if it's a bandaid fix, or why google.com was not included in the default exclusion list? > > Furthermore, turning off the checkbox also resolves the issue, as well as turning off adguard entirely. Username: `@sworosh` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/nml17e8km8g8kgwk84wcs8w0okckkoghw04l6cf38o.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4qxst969394w4gwgg8go808kgww804s7nlulelcq1s.png?nc=1)

### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.16.3.1867 release System version: | MacOS 15.3 (Build 24D60) Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid Tracking protection options: | Block Push API,
Block Location API,

issue.title: TurboTax ReCaptcha Failures
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

Ad blocking DNS incorporated into Asus routers:  94.140.14.14, 94.140.15.15

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://turbotax.intuit.com/personal-taxes/cd-download/install-turbotax/ (specifically the desktop application downloaded with codes from Amazon, Costco, and other retailers)

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. TurboTax has been having issues with reCaptcha this year when importing data from banks and other financial institutions; in my case, the problem turned out to be AdGuard DNS; when I disabled that and flushed my DNS I was able to pass the captcha and download my data as expected.  (Flushing DNS alone didn't resolve the issue, so it is still active as far as I can tell.)  Presumably there is something in the AdGuard filters that is breaking TurboTax's implementation of Captcha.

2. Screenshots

See this thread for examples:  https://ttlc.intuit.com/community/taxes/discussion/recaptcha-error-on-import/00/3425291/page/3
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b13fbb23-4492-4de5-a964-5cc738ef210b)

</details>

issue.title: Temu.com captcha blocked
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.62.0 on Firefox with AdGuard Tracking Protection list

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.temu.com/ 

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

When browsing https://www.temu.com/ with a VPN (or Tor) a captcha needs to be filled. The rule `||temu.com/api/phantom/$xhr` in `AdGuard Tracking Protection` is blocking the captcha, a _Network Error_ is shown and the page refreshes itself until being blocked by Temu.

Rules like these makes it work again:
```
@@||www.temu.com/api/phantom/vc_pre_ck$xhr,domain=www.temu.com
@@||www.temu.com/api/phantom/obtain_captcha$xhr,domain=www.temu.com

```

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/af7a5e1e-199b-4447-b6c5-b295d8f26689)

</details>



</details>


### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition
